2 #include <ros/ros.h>
3 #include <sensor_msgs/Image.h>
4 #include <cv_bridge/cv_bridge.h>
5 #include <sensor_msgs/CameraInfo.h>
6 #include <opencv2/imgproc/imgproc.hpp>
7 #include <opencv2/opencv.hpp>
8 #include <pcl_ros/point_cloud.h>
9 #include <pcl/point_types.h>
10 #include <pcl/filters/voxel_grid.h>
11 #include <image_transport/image_transport.h>
12 #include <opencv2/core/ocl.hpp>
13 
14 typedef pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZ> PointCloud;
15 typedef pcl::PointXYZ PointXYZ;
16 
17 //TODO *Dynamic reconfigure for all params
18 // *Documentation
19 // *Try it with navigation stack and evaluate performance
20 
21 
22 void kinectCallback(const sensor_msgs::Image::ConstPtr& rawImgPtr, sensor_msgs::Image* rawImg, sensor_msgs::Image* procImg){
23  *rawImg = *rawImgPtr;
24  cv_bridge::CvImagePtr cv_ptr;
25  try{
26  cv_ptr = cv_bridge::toCvCopy(*rawImg, rawImg->encoding);
27  }catch (cv_bridge::Exception& e){
28  ROS_ERROR("cv_bridge exception: %s", e.what());
29  }
30  cv::UMat imgIn = cv_ptr->image.getUMat(cv::ACCESS_READ);
31  cv::UMat imgOut;
32  cv::medianBlur(imgIn, imgOut, 5);
33 
34  cv_bridge::CvImage cvi;
35  cvi.header = rawImg->header;
36  cvi.encoding = rawImg->encoding;
37  cvi.image = imgOut.getMat(cv::ACCESS_READ);
38  cvi.toImageMsg(*procImg);
39 }
40 
41 void pointCloudCallback(const PointCloud::ConstPtr& rawPointCloud, PointCloud::Ptr cloudFiltered) {
42  PointCloud::Ptr cloud (new PointCloud);
43  *cloud = *rawPointCloud;
44  pcl::VoxelGrid<PointXYZ> vox;
45  vox.setInputCloud(cloud);
46  // The leaf size is more or less the size of voxels. Note that these values affect what a good threshold value would be.
47  vox.setLeafSize(0.05f, 0.05f, 0.05f);
48  // This limits the overall volume of points. Being "far away" points considered as irrelevant.
49  vox.setFilterLimits(-1.0, 3.0);
50  // The line below is perhaps the most important as it reduces ghost points.
51  vox.setMinimumPointsNumberPerVoxel(8);
52  vox.filter(*cloudFiltered);
53  cloudFiltered->header.frame_id = "base_footprint";
54 }
55 
56 void infoCallback(const sensor_msgs::CameraInfo::ConstPtr& cameraInfo, sensor_msgs::CameraInfo* output) {
57  *output = *cameraInfo;
58 }
59 
60 int main(int argc, char **argv){
61 
62  ros::init(argc, argv, "kinect_filter");
63  ros::NodeHandle nh;
64  image_transport::ImageTransport it(nh);
65 
66  sensor_msgs::Image procImg;
67  sensor_msgs::Image rawImg;
68  sensor_msgs::CameraInfo cameraInfo;
69 
70  PointCloud::Ptr cloudFiltered (new PointCloud);
71 
72  std::string depth_image_topic;
73  std::string camera_info_topic;
74  std::string output_depth_image_topic;
75 
76  if (!ros::param::get("~depth_image_topic", depth_image_topic))
77  {
78  ROS_ERROR("Depth image topic was not provided!");
79  return -1;
80  }
81 
82  if (!ros::param::get("~camera_info_topic", camera_info_topic))
83  {
84  ROS_ERROR("Camera_info topic was not provided!");
85  return -1;
86  }
87 
88  ros::param::param<std::string>("~output_depth_image_topic", output_depth_image_topic, "kinect2/depth_filtered");
89 
90  ros::Subscriber kinectImg = nh.subscribe<sensor_msgs::Image>(depth_image_topic, 1, boost::bind(kinectCallback, _1, &rawImg, &procImg));
91  ros::Subscriber kinectInfo = nh.subscribe<sensor_msgs::CameraInfo>(camera_info_topic, 1, boost::bind(infoCallback, _1, &cameraInfo));
92  image_transport::CameraPublisher kinectDepthPub = it.advertiseCamera(output_depth_image_topic, 1);
93  ros::Subscriber kinectCloud = nh.subscribe<PointCloud>("/points", 1, boost::bind(pointCloudCallback, _1, cloudFiltered));
94  ros::Publisher kinectCloudProc = nh.advertise<PointCloud> ("/points_filtered", 1);
95 
96 
97  ros::Rate loop_rate(35);
98  while(ros::ok()) {
99 
100  kinectDepthPub.publish(procImg, cameraInfo, ros::Time::now());
101  kinectCloudProc.publish(cloudFiltered);
102  ros::spinOnce();
103  loop_rate.sleep();
104 }
105 
106  return 0;
107 
108 }
